languages.text: "Если так хотите выяснить отношения с губернатором — вызовите его на дуэль, или что там дворяне делают. Больше никаких ложных обвинений и подтасовок документов Администратума, арбитрам и без вас есть чем заняться".
languages.translation_comment:
Completed Abelard's second quest. Regina was exposed and executed either alone or along with the rest of the Sauerbacks.
Abelard: "One day I shall remind Drivestem that he was ready to bury my family based on some trumped-up charges. One day... not now."

languages.text: "If you are so adamant about settling the score with the governor, then challenge him to a duel, or whatever it is nobles do. No more false accusations or tampering with Administratum documents — Arbitrators can find better uses for their time."
languages.translation_comment:
Completed Abelard's second quest. Regina was exposed and executed either alone or along with the rest of the Sauerbacks.
Abelard: "One day I shall remind Drivestem that he was ready to bury my family based on some trumped-up charges. One day... not now."
languages.original_text: "Если так хотите выяснить отношения с губернатором — вызовите его на дуэль, или что там дворяне делают. Больше никаких ложных обвинений и подтасовок документов Администратума, арбитрам и без вас есть чем заняться".

traits.locale_text: "If you so desperately wish to settle the score with the governor, then challenge him to a duel or do whatever it is nobles do. No more false accusations or tampering with Administratum documents — Arbitrators have better things to occupy themselves with."

"If you so desperately wish to settle the score with the governor, then challenge him to a duel or do whatever it is nobles do. No more false accusations or tampering with Administratum documents — Arbitrators have better things to occupy themselves with."

"If you are so adamant about settling the score with the governor, then challenge him to a duel, or whatever it is nobles do. No more false accusations or tampering with Administratum documents — Arbitrators can find better uses for their time."

"If you are so adamant about settling the score with the governor, then challenge him to a duel, or whatever it is nobles do. No more false accusations or tampering with Administratum documents — Arbitrators can find better uses for their time."

languages.text: 「総督に恨みを晴らすことにそれほどまでに固執するなら、決闘を申し込むか、貴族がやることをやればいい。これ以上の虚偽の告発や行政局の文書の改ざんはやめろ。アービトレイターたちはもっと有意義なことに時間を使えるはずだ」
languages.original_text: "If you are so adamant about settling the score with the governor, then challenge him to a duel, or whatever it is nobles do. No more false accusations or tampering with Administratum documents — Arbitrators can find better uses for their time."

traits.locale_text: 「総督に恨みを晴らすことにそれほどまでに固執するなら、決闘を申し込むか、貴族がやることをやればいい。これ以上の虚偽の告発や行政局の文書の改ざんはやめろ。アービトレイターたちはもっと有意義なことに時間を使えるはずだ」

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr so darauf erpicht seid, die Rechnung mit dem Gouverneur zu begleichen, dann fordert ihn zu einem Duell heraus, oder was Adlige eben so machen. Keine falschen Anschuldigungen mehr, keine Manipulation von Dokumenten des Administratums – Arbitratoren können ihre Zeit besser verwenden."
languages.original_text: "If you are so adamant about settling the score with the governor, then challenge him to a duel, or whatever it is nobles do. No more false accusations or tampering with Administratum documents — Arbitrators can find better uses for their time."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr so darauf erpicht seid, die Rechnung mit dem Gouverneur zu begleichen, dann fordert ihn zu einem Duell heraus, oder was Adlige eben so machen. Keine falschen Anschuldigungen mehr, keine Manipulation von Dokumenten des Administratums – Arbitratoren können ihre Zeit besser verwenden."

languages.text: «Si tantas ganas tiene de ajustar cuentas con el gobernador, rételo a un duelo o lo que sea que hacen los nobles. Basta de falsas acusaciones y de manipular documentos del Administratum... Bastante trabajo tenemos ya los Arbitrator».
languages.original_text: "If you are so adamant about settling the score with the governor, then challenge him to a duel, or whatever it is nobles do. No more false accusations or tampering with Administratum documents — Arbitrators can find better uses for their time."

traits.locale_text: «Si tantas ganas tiene de ajustar cuentas con el gobernador, rételo a un duelo o lo que sea que hacen los nobles. Basta de falsas acusaciones y de manipular documentos del Administratum... Bastante trabajo tenemos ya los Arbitrator».

languages.text: “如果你坚持要和那个总督算账的话，就和他决斗吧，或者随便按照什么贵族传统解决问题。千万别再搞出类似于虚假指控或篡改行政文件这种事情，法务官还有更重要的事情要做。”
languages.original_text: "If you are so adamant about settling the score with the governor, then challenge him to a duel, or whatever it is nobles do. No more false accusations or tampering with Administratum documents — Arbitrators can find better uses for their time."

traits.locale_text: “如果你坚持要和那个总督算账的话，就和他决斗吧，或者随便按照什么贵族传统解决问题。千万别再搞出类似于虚假指控或篡改行政文件这种事情，法务官还有更重要的事情要做。”

languages.text: "Valiyle hesaplaşma konusunda bu kadar kararlısın madem, kendisine düello teklif et. Ya da soylular ne yapıyorsa artık... Ancak şu sahte suçlamalara ve Administratum belgeleriyle oynamaya bir son ver. Yargıcıların daha önemli işleri var."
languages.original_text: "If you are so adamant about settling the score with the governor, then challenge him to a duel, or whatever it is nobles do. No more false accusations or tampering with Administratum documents — Arbitrators can find better uses for their time."

traits.locale_text: "Valiyle hesaplaşma konusunda bu kadar kararlısın madem, kendisine düello teklif et. Ya da soylular ne yapıyorsa artık... Ancak şu sahte suçlamalara ve Administratum belgeleriyle oynamaya bir son ver. Yargıcıların daha önemli işleri var."

languages.original_text: "If you are so adamant about settling the score with the governor, then challenge him to a duel, or whatever it is nobles do. No more false accusations or tampering with Administratum documents — Arbitrators can find better uses for their time."

languages.text: « Si vous tenez tant à régler vos comptes avec le gouverneur, défiez-le en duel ou faites appel à tout autre moyen qu'emploie habituellement la noblesse. Mais cessez vos fausses accusations et les falsifications de documents de l'Administratum. Les arbitrators ont mieux à faire. »
languages.original_text: "If you are so adamant about settling the score with the governor, then challenge him to a duel, or whatever it is nobles do. No more false accusations or tampering with Administratum documents — Arbitrators can find better uses for their time."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous tenez tant à régler vos comptes avec le gouverneur, défiez-le en duel ou faites appel à tout autre moyen qu'emploie habituellement la noblesse. Mais cessez vos fausses accusations et les falsifications de documents de l'Administratum. Les arbitrators ont mieux à faire. »
